greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of colored compositions of n using all colors of an n-set such that any part i has a color pattern of i (distinct) colors in increasing order.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..444
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p) option remember; `if`(n=0, p!, `if`(i<1, 0,
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 21 2019
